original_text:
Legend of Fortune
Se siete alla ricerca di avventura nel gioco alle slot online, non potete sbagliare di molto con la slot WMS Legend of Fortune. Sviluppato da Red 7 mobile e distribuito da SG Digital, Legend of Fortune è stato rilasciato nel luglio 2018. Una delle tante grandi slot WMS gratuite, questo gioco è pronto a portarvi in esplorazione all’interno di alcuni degli antichi monumenti della giungla dell’America Centrale. Si tratta di una slot a cinque rulli e 20 linee a pagamento con una varietà di funzioni bonus per tenere impegnati gli esploratori più intrepidi.
Una grafica emozionante
Fin dall’inizio, Legend of Fortune vi prepara all’avventura, mostrandovi un rapido sguardo alle caratteristiche e alle vittorie in offerta mentre il gioco si carica, seguito da un’animazione di un personaggio tipo Lara Croft che corre tra le rovine per raggiungere una ruota d’oro. Non sarà l’ultima volta che la vedrete; se sarete abbastanza fortunati da attivare una delle caratteristiche bonus, la guiderete verso quella ruota per una delle vittorie più grandi.
Questo slot prende ispirazione visiva da serie di avventure come Tomb Raider e Indiana Jones, e le sue caratteristiche sono caratterizzate dai pericoli che si associano a quegli avventurieri che esplorano antichi templi o sfidano le maledizioni degli antichi dei. Le bobine stesse sono incastonate in una struttura di pietra, ornata da una semplice decorazione di una ruota d’oro cerchiata da petali di pietra in ogni angolo. I simboli che i mulinelli portano raffigurano le armi e gli dei legati alle antiche civiltà dell’America centrale, varie creature che si possono trovare nelle foreste pluviali circostanti e oggetti che si possono trovare in uno zaino da avventuriero.
I simboli colorati e gli schermi bonus vi trasporteranno in un’avventura sepolcrale in stile semi-cartoon, e le caratteristiche bonus sono ben integrate nel tema. Le immagini del gioco tendono più alla fantasia che alla riproduzione accurata di scene e manufatti di un singolo popolo o di una civiltà. Tuttavia, è stata posta molta cura e attenzione nel fare in modo che i dettagli di ogni simbolo e di ogni scena siano riprodotti abbastanza bene da poter essere riconosciuti da artefatti della vita reale provenienti dalle numerose culture e da tutti i tempi in cui sono vissuti.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
C’è un bonus a sorpresa in serbo per voi durante il gioco di base, se siete fortunati, ed è un bonus per il quale non avrete bisogno della dispersione. Assicuratevi di fare attenzione alle Mura Selvagge. Possono iniziare a chiudersi su di voi in qualsiasi momento durante il gioco! Cominciano schiacciando il mulinello 5, schiacciandolo fino a quando l’intero mulinello diventa selvaggio. Poi si ottiene un altro giro con il mulinello selvaggio fissato, e se non c’è vittoria, i muri inizieranno a chiudersi ulteriormente. Gradualmente, i rulli 1, 2 e 4 saranno superati con l’espansione delle bobine selvagge fino a quando non ci sarà una vittoria, o quando i muri di compressione alla fine si incontreranno nel mezzo.
Ora parliamo dello Scatter. Tre urne zapoteche vi permetteranno di accedere al selezionatore di caratteristiche bonus, dove un antico dio custodisce l’ingresso a tre passaggi, affiancato da due torce accese. Qualunque sia il passaggio che sceglierete, vi porterà a uno dei tre bonus. Questi bonus sono i Temple Escape Free Spins, i Tumbling Free Spins, e i Stepping Stones Bonus.
Se siete pronti a fuggire dal Tempio, dovrete essere pronti a superare i Wild Darts, i Crushing Spikes e il Pit of Wealth. Per fortuna, inizierete con otto giri liberi. Superatele tutte e avrete due giri gratis in più. Non preoccupatevi, le trappole non sono una brutta notizia. Farsi colpire da dardi selvaggi volanti è una buona cosa, perché ogni simbolo che viene colpito sarà reso selvaggio. Se durante il vostro viaggio scatenerete dei picchi di schiacciamento, loro faranno lo stesso; anche qualsiasi simbolo lanciato da loro sarà trasformato in wild. Se la Fossa della Ricchezza si apre, i simboli possono cadere dentro di loro ed essere sostituiti da un simbolo gigantesco e casuale per le vittorie. La nostra avventuriera della schermata di caricamento ritorna nelle vesti di uno dei simboli. Apparirà solo sul rullo 5, ma quando lo farà, vi aiuterà a superare ogni trappola.
Scegliete il Tumbling Wilds, e inizierete con 10 Rotazioni libere. Sfuggire al crollo mentre i simboli crollano come blocchi di pietra mentre girano. Qualsiasi simbolo sulle linee vincenti esploderà, lasciando che i blocchi sopra di loro cadano direttamente negli spazi vuoti. Questo significa che si possono ottenere più vittorie da ogni testacoda. Una volta che le vittorie si fermano, i simboli vengono sostituiti con il successivo giro libero.
Ultimo, ma non meno importante, è il Bonus Stepping Stones. La nostra intrepida avventuriera è tornata di nuovo, ed è compito vostro guidarla alla pietra finale e raccogliere i moltiplicatori durante il viaggio. Ogni volta che riesci a superare con successo una pietra bonus, il tuo premio moltiplicatore aumenta.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Sei un fan delle avventure mozzafiato e delle misteriose cacce al tesoro? Allora prova Tomb Raider 2: The Secret of the Sword di Microgaming, o forse Gonzo’s Quest di NetEnt, per placare la tua sete di spedizioni vincenti.

raw_translation.response:
Legend of Fortune

Looking for some adventure while playing an online slot game? Look no further than WMS' Legend of Fortune. Developed by Red 7 Mobile and distributed by SG Digital, this game was released in July 2018. As one of many great WMS free slots, this game will take you on an exploration of some of the ancient monuments of the Central American jungle. This five-reel, 20-payline slot offers a variety of bonus features to keep even the most intrepid explorers engaged.

An Exciting Graphical Experience

From the start, Legend of Fortune prepares you for adventure, giving you a quick look at the features and wins on offer as the game loads, followed by an animation of a Lara Croft-style character running through ruins to reach a golden wheel. That won't be the last you'll see of her; if you're lucky enough to activate one of the bonus features, you'll guide her towards that wheel for one of the biggest wins.

This slot takes visual inspiration from adventure series like Tomb Raider and Indiana Jones, and its features are characterized by the dangers associated with those adventurers who explore ancient temples or defy the curses of ancient gods. The reels themselves are embedded in a stone structure, adorned with a simple decoration of a golden wheel encircled by stone petals in each corner. The symbols that the reels carry depict weapons and gods tied to the ancient civilizations of Central America, various creatures that can be found in the surrounding rainforests, and objects that can be found in an adventurer's backpack.

The colorful symbols and bonus screens will transport you to a semi-cartoon-style burial adventure, and the bonus features are well integrated into the theme. The game images tend more towards fantasy than an accurate reproduction of scenes and artifacts from a single people or civilization. However, much care and attention have been taken to ensure that the details of each symbol and each scene are reproduced well enough to be recognized as artifacts of real-life objects from numerous cultures and all the times in which they lived.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine

There's a surprise bonus in store for you during the base game, if you're lucky, and it's a bonus for which you won't need a scatter. Make sure to look out for the Wild Walls. They can start closing in on you at any time during the game! They begin by crushing reel 5, pushing it until the entire reel turns wild. Then you get another free spin with the wild reel locked in place, and if there's no win, the walls will start closing in further. Gradually, reels 1, 2, and 4 will be overtaken with expanding wild reels until there's a win, or when the compression walls finally meet in the middle.

Now let's talk about the scatter. Three Zapotec urns will give you access to the bonus feature selector, where an ancient god guards the entrance to three passages, flanked by two lit torches. Whichever passage you choose will take you to one of three bonuses. These bonuses are the Temple Escape Free Spins, the Tumbling Free Spins, and the Stepping Stones Bonus.

If you're ready to flee the temple, you'll need to be prepared to overcome the Wild Darts, Crushing Spikes, and the Pit of Wealth. Luckily, you'll start with eight free spins. If you successfully overcome them all, you'll get two more free spins. Don't worry, the traps aren't bad news. Being hit by flying wild darts is a good thing because every symbol that gets hit is turned wild. If you trigger the crushing spikes during your journey, they'll do the same; any symbol they launch will also turn wild. If the Pit of Wealth opens up, symbols can fall into it and be replaced by a giant, random symbol for wins. Our loading screen adventurer returns as one of the symbols. She'll only appear on reel 5, but when she does, she'll help you overcome any trap.

Choose Tumbling Wilds, and you'll start with 10 free spins. Escape the collapse as the symbols tumble down like stone blocks while they spin. Any symbols on winning lines will explode, causing the blocks above them to fall directly into the empty spaces. This means that you can get more wins from every spin. Once the wins stop, the symbols are replaced with the next free spin.

Last but not least, there's the Stepping Stones Bonus. Our intrepid adventurer has returned, and it's your job to guide her to the final stone and collect multipliers along the way. Every time you successfully pass a bonus stone, your multiplier prize increases.

Similar Slot Machines

Are you a fan of breathtaking adventures and mysterious treasure hunts? Then try Microgaming's Tomb Raider 2: The Secret of the Sword, or perhaps NetEnt's Gonzo's Quest to quench your thirst for winning expeditions.

Review: Legend of Fortune

Looking for some adventure while playing an online slot game? Look no further than WMS' Legend of Fortune. Developed by Red 7 Mobile and distributed by SG Digital, this game was released in July 2018. As one of many great WMS free slots, this game will take you on an exploration of some of the ancient monuments of the Central American jungle. This five-reel, 20-payline slot offers a variety of bonus features to keep even the most intrepid explorers engaged.

An Exciting Graphical Experience

From the start, Legend of Fortune prepares you for adventure, giving you a quick look at the features and wins on offer as the game loads, followed by an animation of a Lara Croft-style character running through ruins to reach a golden wheel. That won't be the last you'll see of her; if you're lucky enough to activate one of the bonus features, you'll guide her towards that wheel for one of the biggest wins.

This slot takes visual inspiration from adventure series like Tomb Raider and Indiana Jones, and its features are characterized by the dangers associated with those adventurers who explore ancient temples or defy the curses of ancient gods. The reels themselves are embedded in a stone structure, adorned with a simple decoration of a golden wheel encircled by stone petals in each corner. The symbols that the reels carry depict weapons and gods tied to the ancient civilizations of Central America, various creatures that can be found in the surrounding rainforests, and objects that can be found in an adventurer's backpack.

The colorful symbols and bonus screens will transport you to a semi-cartoon-style burial adventure, and the bonus features are well integrated into the theme. The game images tend more towards fantasy than an accurate reproduction of scenes and artifacts from a single people or civilization. However, much care and attention have been taken to ensure that the details of each symbol and each scene are reproduced well enough to be recognized as artifacts of real-life objects from numerous cultures and all the times in which they lived.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine

There's a surprise bonus in store for you during the base game, if you're lucky, and it's a bonus for which you won't need a scatter. Make sure to look out for the Wild Walls. They can start closing in on you at any time during the game! They begin by crushing reel 5, pushing it until the entire reel turns wild. Then you get another free spin with the wild reel locked in place, and if there's no win, the walls will start closing in further. Gradually, reels 1, 2, and 4 will be overtaken with expanding wild reels until there's a win, or when the compression walls finally meet in the middle.

Now let's talk about the scatter. Three Zapotec urns will give you access to the bonus feature selector, where an ancient god guards the entrance to three passages, flanked by two lit torches. Whichever passage you choose will take you to one of three bonuses. These bonuses are the Temple Escape Free Spins, the Tumbling Free Spins, and the Stepping Stones Bonus.

If you're ready to flee the temple, you'll need to be prepared to overcome the Wild Darts, Crushing Spikes, and the Pit of Wealth. Luckily, you'll start with eight free spins. If you successfully overcome them all, you'll get two more free spins. Don't worry, the traps aren't bad news. Being hit by flying wild darts is a good thing because every symbol that gets hit is turned wild. If you trigger the crushing spikes during your journey, they'll do the same; any symbol they launch will also turn wild. If the Pit of Wealth opens up, symbols can fall into it and be replaced by a giant, random symbol for wins. Our loading screen adventurer returns as one of the symbols. She'll only appear on reel 5, but when she does, she'll help you overcome any trap.

Choose Tumbling Wilds, and you'll start with 10 free spins. Escape the collapse as the symbols tumble down like stone blocks while they spin. Any symbols on winning lines will explode, causing the blocks above them to fall directly into the empty spaces. This means that you can get more wins from every spin. Once the wins stop, the symbols are replaced with the next free spin.

Last but not least, there's the Stepping Stones Bonus. Our intrepid adventurer has returned, and it's your job to guide her to the final stone and collect multipliers along the way. Every time you successfully pass a bonus stone, your multiplier prize increases.

Similar Slot Machines

Are you a fan of breathtaking adventures and mysterious treasure hunts? Then try Microgaming's Tomb Raider 2: The Secret of the Sword, or perhaps NetEnt's Gonzo's Quest to quench your thirst for winning expeditions.

Features and Symbols of the Slot Machine

There's a surprise bonus in store for you during the base game, if you're lucky, and it's a bonus for which you won't need a scatter. Make sure to look out for the Wild Walls. They can start closing in on you at any time during the game! They begin by crushing reel 5, pushing it until the entire reel turns wild. Then you get another free spin with the wild reel locked in place, and if there's no win, the walls will start closing in further. Gradually, reels 1, 2, and 4 will be overtaken with expanding wild reels until there's a win, or when the compression walls finally meet in the middle.

Now let's talk about the scatter. Three Zapotec urns will give you access to the bonus feature selector, where an ancient god guards the entrance to three passages, flanked by two lit torches. Whichever passage you choose will take you to one of three bonuses. These bonuses are the Temple Escape Free Spins, the Tumbling Free Spins, and the Stepping Stones Bonus.

If you're ready to flee the temple, you'll need to be prepared to overcome the Wild Darts, Crushing Spikes, and the Pit of Wealth. Luckily, you'll start with eight free spins. If you successfully overcome them all, you'll get two more free spins. Don't worry, the traps aren't bad news. Being hit by flying wild darts is a good thing because every symbol that gets hit is turned wild. If you trigger the crushing spikes during your journey, they'll do the same; any symbol they launch will also turn wild. If the Pit of Wealth opens up, symbols can fall into it and be replaced by a giant, random symbol for wins. Our loading screen adventurer returns as one of the symbols. She'll only appear on reel 5, but when she does, she'll help you overcome any trap.

Choose Tumbling Wilds, and you'll start with 10 free spins. Escape the collapse as the symbols tumble down like stone blocks while they spin. Any symbols on winning lines will explode, causing the blocks above them to fall directly into the empty spaces. This means that you can get more wins from every spin. Once the wins stop, the symbols are replaced with the next free spin.

Last but not least, there's the Stepping Stones Bonus. Our intrepid adventurer has returned, and it's your job to guide her to the final stone and collect multipliers along the way. Every time you successfully pass a bonus stone, your multiplier prize increases.
